name: Venura Pesanjith
title: Founder
text: Meet Venura Pesanjith, our Founder, who wears many hats, including leading our machine learning efforts. With a knack for designing robust architectures and a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms, Venura ensures our system is both cutting-edge and scalable.

name: Geenodh Gamage
title: HCI Expert and Team Leader
text: Geenodh Gamage, our HCI Expert and Team Leader, brings a wealth of experience in UI/UX usability. Geenodh ensures our project stays on track, fostering collaboration and guiding our vision to create user-centric designs that elevate our product.

name: Anuda Gunarathna
title: Frontend Developer (React)
text: Anuda Gunarathna, our talented Frontend Developer well-versed in React, crafts seamless user experiences, translating complex ideas into intuitive interfaces that delight our users.

name: Gimindu Athapaththu
title: Frontend Developer (React)
text: Gimindu Athapaththu, our skilled Frontend Developer well-versed in React, crafts seamless user experiences, translating complex ideas into intuitive interfaces that delight our users.

name: Avisha Dilhara
title: Machine Learning Enthusiast (Novice Full Stack)
text: Avisha Dilhara, our Machine Learning Enthusiast with a passion for machine learning and a solid foundation in full-stack development, is eager to dive deep into all aspects of our project, contributing fresh perspectives and innovative solutions.
